full_summary:
## K4A22-241062 Fire Pump Replacement
### Contract Title / Titre du marché
Contractors are invited to bid on the K4A22-241062 Fire Pump Replacement tender.

### Notice of Opportunity / Avis d'appel d'offres
 Solicitation Number: WS4577371133
Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
Publication Date: July 13, 2024
Tender Closing Date: August 6, 2024
Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

### Tender Description / Description du marché
The Work of this contract comprises the construction of a replacement of the existing fire pump with a new fire pump and associated equipment for the Pacific Wildlife Research Center in Delta, British Columbia.

### Contract Information / Informations sur le marché

* Unspsc: *72141125, *72151502, *92121702
  + UNSPSC Description:
    - Pumping station construction service
    - Electric power system construction service
    - Fire alarm maintenance or monitoring

* Procurement Category: CNST
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None

### Tender Cancellation / Cancellation du marché
Invalid for cancellation.

### Contractor Information / Informations du contrevenants
All contractors are expected to submit their tenders electronically, in accordance with the requirements outlined in the tender document.

### Contracting Entity / Entité contractante
The contracting entity is:
- Contracting Entity: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
- Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

- Contact Information for Department of the Environment (ECCC):
  - End User Entities Address Line: 200 Boulevard Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X4C6
  - Contact Information: Tian Lam at tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Important Information / Informations importantes

* Please submit your response using Ariba Solutions, as per the attached notice document.
* All questions and concerns related to this RFP should be directed to the primary contact, Tian Lam.
* All bids shall be thoroughly examined, and considered, and the bidder deemed most compliant will be awarded the contract.

(Note: URLs and images have been omitted as unnecessary)  [^1]   [^2]   [^3]   [^4]
